Package ntnu.idatt2106.group8.gidd.controller

Class ActivityController

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt2106.group8.gidd.controller.ActivityController
@RestController
@RequestMapping
@CrossOrigin(origins="*",
             allowedHeaders="*")
public class ActivityController
extends java.lang.Object

  • Method Details

    • getActivities

      @GetMapping("/activities") public java.util.List<Activity> getActivities()
      GetMapping for fetching all registered Activities
      Returns:
      a list of all registered Activites

    • getActivity

      @GetMapping("/activities/{id}") public java.util.Optional<Activity> getActivity​(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      GetMapping for getting an Activity with a specified id
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the Activity
      Returns:
      the Activity found with the specified id

    • addActivity

      @PostMapping("/activities") public boolean addActivity​(@RequestBody Activity activity)
      PostMapping for adding a new Activity
      Parameters:
      activity - requesting the body of the Activity to be added
      Returns:
      the Activity that was added

    • updateActivity

      @PutMapping("/activities/{id}") public Activity updateActivity​(@RequestBody Activity newActivity, @PathVariable("id") int id)
      PutMapping for updating a specific Activity
      Parameters:
      newActivity - requesting the body of a new (updated version) of the Activity
      id - PathVariable for the id of the Activity to be updated
      Returns:
      the Activity that was updated

    • getActivitiesByType

      @GetMapping("/activities/type={type}") public java.util.List<Activity> getActivitiesByType​(@PathVariable java.lang.String type)
      GetMapping for getting all Activities of a certain type
      Parameters:
      type - PathVariable for the type to find Activities by
      Returns:
      a list of Activities of this type

    • getActivityType

      @GetMapping("/activities/{id}/type") public java.lang.String getActivityType​(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      GetMapping for getting the ActivityType of a specified Activity
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the Activity
      Returns:
      the type of this Activity as a String

    • getActivityEquipment

      @GetMapping("/activities/{id}/equipment") public java.util.Set<Equipment> getActivityEquipment​(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      GetMapping for getting all the Equipment of a specific Activity
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the Activity
      Returns:
      a Set of Equipment for this Activity

    • addParticipantToActivity

      @PostMapping("/activities/{activity_id}/accounts/{participant_id}") public java.util.Optional<AccountActivity> addParticipantToActivity​(@PathVariable("activity_id") int activityId, @PathVariable("participant_id") int participantId)
      PostMapping for adding a specific Account as participant to a specific Activity
      Parameters:
      activityId - PathVariable for the id of the Activity
      participantId - PathVariable for the id of the Account
      Returns:
      the Account that was added to the Activity

    • deleteActivity

      @DeleteMapping("/activities/{id}") public void deleteActivity​(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      DeleteMapping for deleting a specific Activity
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the Activity

    • getAllAccountsInActivity

      @GetMapping("/activities/{id}/accounts") public java.util.List<Account> getAllAccountsInActivity​(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      GetMapping for getting all the Accounts in a specific Activity
      Parameters:
      id - PathVariable for the id of the Activity
      Returns:
      a list of Accounts participating in the Activity

    • countAllAccountsInActivity

      @GetMapping("/activities/{activity_id}/accounts/count") public java.lang.Integer countAllAccountsInActivity​(@PathVariable("activity_id") int id)

    • checkIfAccountIsInActivity

      @GetMapping("/activities/{activity_id}/accounts/{account_id}") public boolean checkIfAccountIsInActivity​(@PathVariable("activity_id") int activityId, @PathVariable("account_id") int accountId)
      GetMapping for checking if a specific Account is participating in a specific Activity
      Parameters:
      activityId - the PathVariable for the id of the Activity
      accountId - the PathVariable for the id of the Account
      Returns:
      true or false

    • getAllAccountsInQueue

      @GetMapping("activities/{id}/accounts/queue") public java.util.List<Account> getAllAccountsInQueue​(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      GetMapping for getting all Accounts in queue in a specific Activity
      Parameters:
      id - PathVariable for the id the the Activity
      Returns:
      a list of Accounts in queue for the Activity

      @GetMapping("activities/{id}/accounts/queue/count") public int countAllAccountsInQueue​(@PathVariable("id") int id)

      @PutMapping("activities/{id}/cancel") public boolean cancelActivity​(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      PutMapping for cancelling a specific Activity
      Parameters:
      id - the PathVariable for the id of the Activity
      Returns:
      true or false

    • deleteEquipmentFromActivity

      @DeleteMapping("activities/{id}/equipment") public boolean deleteEquipmentFromActivity​(@PathVariable("id") int id, @RequestBody java.lang.String equipment)
      DeleteMapping for deleting an Equipment from a specific Activity
      Parameters:
      id - the PathVariable for the id of the Activity
      equipment - requesting a String parameter for the description of the Equipment
      Returns:
      true or false

    • getActivityMessages

      @GetMapping("activities/{id}/messages") public java.util.List<ChatMessage> getActivityMessages​(@PathVariable int id)
      Endpoint for finding all messages that is in a activity.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the activity.
      Returns:
      a list sorted by date with messages.

    • deleteMessage

      @DeleteMapping("messages/{id}") public void deleteMessage​(@PathVariable int id)
      Endpoint for deleting a message.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the message to delete.

    • addMessageToActivity

      @PostMapping("activities/{id}/messages") public void addMessageToActivity​(@PathVariable("id") int activityId, @RequestBody ChatMessage message)
      Endpoint for adding a message to a specific activity.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to add to the activity.
